snippet: A team that seems overmatched says the only way it can compete is by leaving town for a new stadium.
lead_paragraph: A team that seems overmatched says the only way it can compete is by leaving town for a new stadium.

headline.print_headline: Opening Day in Oakland, With Prospects of Doubleheader of Anguish for A’s Fans
headline.seo: Oakland Athletics Fans Face Anguish on Opening Day
headline.main: Opening Day in Oakland, With Prospects of Doubleheader of Anguish for A’s Fans
